title: DOMINION SYSTEMS ELECTION FRAUD? Everything We Know
description: Steven reviews the weekend violence in D.C. at the pro-Trump march, then turns to examine the use of Dominion Systems voting machines in the 2020 election. Finally, he looks at the science on catching COVID twice and whether the "experts" were right in the outrage over Rand Paul's recent comments.
